price: Dhugumatti, galmeen badii hojjattootaa Sijjiin keessa ta'a.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
